title: 2013년 The Bank of New York Mellon v. Johnson 사건

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The Bank of New York Mellon v. Johnson
**판결일**: 2013-07-17
**법원**: Hawaii Supreme Court
**관할**: Hawaii, HI


## 판결문 요약

                                                     Electronically Filed
                                                     Supreme Court
                                                     SCWC-12-0000446
                                                     17-JUL-2013
                                                     03:23 PM




                         SCWC-12-0000446

          IN THE SUPREME COURT OF THE STATE OF HAWAI#I


 THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON fka THE BANK OF NEW YORK AS TRUSTEE
FOR THE CERTIFICATEHOLDERS CWMBS, INC., CHL MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH
                   CERTIFICATES SERIES 2006-12,
                Respondents/Plaintiffs-Appellees,

                               vs.

       ARNA LAHELA JOHNSON AND GERALYN LAPITAN CAMARILLO,
               Petitioners/Defendants-Appellants.


         CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS
            (CAAP-12-0000446; CIVIL NO. 1RC10-1-10634)

   AMENDED ORDER DISMISSING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI
(By: Nakayama, Acting C.J., Acoba, McKenna, and Pollack, JJ., and
 Circuit Judge Perkins, in place of Recktenwald, C.J., recused)

          It appearing that the judgment on appeal in the above-
referenced matter not having been filed by the Intermediate Court
of Appeals at the time the application for certiorari was filed,
see Hawai#i Revised Statutes § 602-59(a) (Supp. 2011); see also
Hawai#i Rules of Appellate Procedure (HRAP) Rule 36(b)(1) (2012),
          IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that Petitioners/Def...
